channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: A blog about IT in Île-de-France region

item.title: Test
item.description: Rapide présentation de l’école et des principaux axes éducatifs.

item.title: Sorbonne University
item.description: Created by the merger between highly reputable universities UPMC and Paris Sorbonne, Sorbonne University is one of the biggest Parisian universities, with more than 55,000 students on its various campuses. The University offers several courses in computer science, in French or in English, for long or short periods.

item.title: Epitech
item.description: Epitech (also called European Institute of Technology) is private Computer Science School with multiple campuses around the world and in Europe. The school offers computer courses to international and exchange students.

item.title: EPITA
item.description: Specialised in Computer Science and Engineering since 1984, EPITA is a private French engineering school located a few minutes from Paris, which offers several degree programs in English for international students, from Bachelor to Master.

item.title: Efrei
item.description: Located only 15 minutes from Paris, Efrei is a general engineering school of digital technologies founded almost 90 years ago. Efrei delivers a French engineering degree since 1957 and offers French and English courses to foreign students.

item.title: Ecole 42
item.description: École 42 is a French institution specialised in free and open courses without any prerequisites. During 2 to 5 years, the school trains hundreds of developers by proposing the “self-study” learning method through dozens of projects and programming rushs (called “pools”).

item.title: Test incubator
item.description: Rapide présentation de l’incubateur et des principaux axes professionnels.
